edu.flash3388.flashlib.io

Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.flash3388.flashlib.io.FileReader

  • public class FileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to read files from the robot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileReader

        public FileReader(java.lang.String uri)
           throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                  java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Opens a file at the give URI for reading.
        Parameters:
        uri - The location of the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If given URI is null
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If file was now found
